name: Mi-Go
description: The Mi-Go is a formidable plant creature with high Intelligence and Constitution. It moves swiftly on the ground and can also fly, enhancing its combat tactics.
memorable: Its ability to unleash deadly spores upon death makes the Mi-Go a particularly threatening adversary.
goals: Its goals revolve around survival without typical needs and potentially seeking starlight for sustenance.
relations: It may be encountered with other alien entities or creatures of the void.
environment: Typically found in areas with exposure to starlight or otherworldly locations.
strengths: High Dexterity and notable damage resistances against cold and radiant damage make it durable.
weaknesses: Relies on minimal starlight exposure, which could limit its presence in dark environments.
attacks: Can perform Multiattacks with claws or psychic bolts, dealing significant slashing and psychic damage.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Spore Burst' ability can incapacitate multiple foes while dealing poison damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet and darkvision up to 120 feet, along with a passive Perception of 15.
skills: Notably skilled in Arcana, Deception, and Stealth, allowing for effective use of its abilities.
additional_information: Grapples targets upon successful claw attacks if they are large or smaller.
Survives without air, food, or sleep, requiring minimal starlight exposure.
Can communicate in Common and Void Speech.
test_queries: alien plant creature with deadly spores
mid-level creature that can fly and poison
creature that survives without air or food
